Dialogue: You're leaving? But what about Ms. Karen's sermon later?
She'll be mad if you don't do what you're told . . .
You really are determined to leave, huh?
As long as you're back before the sermon starts, I guess I don't care.
You should take your watch with you when you go. Just be back before the sermon.
She said it'll be at 9:30. It will be your fault if we get punished again!
Be sure to come back, I don't want to get in any trouble.
Oh hey you're back! You're just in time for the sermon.
Wait, what do you mean you're not coming back?
Since this is the end, don’t you wanna stay with your family?
Well. . . I'll see you on the other side.
